actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to restrict the authority of the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with respect to the regulation of vitamin and mineral products for over-the counter use.

summary.text: Voluntary Medicines Act of 1980 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to exclude from the definition of food additive the food itself, a combination of foods, or foods for special dietary use, or the ingredients thereof, unless being used as preservatives or flavors for a food. Excludes from the definition of "drug" foods for special dietary use, or for preservation or treatment of dietary deficiency conditions.

titles.title: A bill to restrict the authority of the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with respect to the regulation of vitamin and mineral products for over-the counter use.
